value:
$WmMPID_双界ソニア,ch10_10_Sonya_FF_Pair,Face|The time has come! Unleash the
full force of your charm!$k$p$nMPID_サーリャ|I...hop I make a good impression!
Hop hop!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|You are so incredibly annoying!
I could destroy you right now!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|No! You...you stop right there!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_SpringFes22,Face|A spat between siblings? What fun!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|I can't find Brother anywhere...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_02,0|$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|...She has been gone for some time.
I wonder what happened to her.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|Oh, Princess Minerva! I hadn't
expected to see you here.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|All three of you have come to the
festival too? Palla, Catria, and Est...
You three are never far apart, hm?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_SpringFes18,Face|Well, actually, I wa— $k$p$WmMPID_春祭エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_SpringFes20,Face|Catria! You don't need to correct
everyone ALL the time, do you?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|Now, now, you two.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Hee hee...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|Oh, look! Is that Princess Maria?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Maria!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|*sniff*$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|What's wrong? What happened?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|I couldn't find Michalis anywhere!
He must not have come to the
festival, I guess...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|I see... As is to be expected from
the likes of him.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|I just wanted us all enjoy the festival
together, like in the old days...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Maria...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_SpringFes18,Face|Please don't be sad, Princess Maria!
Who can say what will happen next
spring festival... Have hope!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_SpringFes20,Face|Yeah! That's right! And next time,
we can all help you look!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|*sniff* ...Really? You will?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_SpringFes19,Face|Of course. Now, why don't you two
come spend the rest of the festival
with us? It will be fun!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|If anyone can convince Michalis
to come to the festival, that person
is you, Maria.$k$pI have every faith you will bring
the three of us together during
our time here.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|If you believe it, then I can too!
...Thank you.$k$pI think I worked up a bit of an
appetite doing all that crying.
I'm hungry!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_SpringFes20,Face|I saw some tasty-looking treats
over in that direction!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Oh, Maria... If only you knew how
your kind heart has saved your
siblings from each other.$k$pI cannot imagine him willingly wearing
a bunny outfit, but...it does seem a
fitting punishment for his absence.$k$p$Sbs150|
